    • dbg

    • runProgram

      public Result runProgram(Program p)
      Execute the Program p. As a result of this method, a Result object is created containing the probability vector for the total system. This probability vector is well defined: every invocation of this method with the same Program p will return a Result instance that has the same probability vector. The Result also contains a list of Qubits, each with a measuredValue. Every invocation of this method, or of the Result.measureSystem method may result in different values for measuredValue for the qubits.
      Specified by:
      runProgram in interface QuantumExecutionEnvironment
      Parameters:
      p - the provided Program to be executed.
      Returns:
      the Result instance containing the probability vector for the system, and a measurement for every qubit.
